message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product for $100. We believe it's a fair price considering its value and the benefits it offers. Looking forward to your response!
I appreciate your offer, Alice, but I was thinking more along the lines of $90. I believe this is a fair price considering the product's value and my budget.
Thank you for your offer, Bob. After careful consideration, we're willing to consider $95 for our product. This reflects a balance between the product's value and our pricing strategy.
I'm getting close to your price, Alice, but I still think I can do better. I'm willing to go up to $92. Can you meet me in the middle?

I understand your position, Bob. Considering the product's quality and your willingness to negotiate, we're prepared to offer the product at $93. We hope this aligns closer to what you're looking for.
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, Alice. However, I'm still a bit short on budget. I'm willing to go up to $91. Can you meet me there?
